briefTitle: Treatment of Adolescent Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Menstrual irregularity defined as cycle length \> 45 days
* Overweight as BMI \> 25
* Clinical evidence of hirsuitism or acne
* Testosterone \> 50ng/dL

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of diabetes mellitus
* History of Cushing's disease
* History of hyperprolactinemia
* Untreated hypo or hyperthyroidism
* History of adrenal hyperplasia
* Significant renal impairment
* Received oral contraceptives, estrogen or progestin or other drugs known to effect lipoprotein metabolism within 2 months of starting the study
* Exercise \> 10 hours per week

outcomeMeasures.title: Measure Number of Adolescent Girls With PCOS Who Can be Successfully Recruited Into a Randomized Clinical Trial That Includes Lifestyle Modification
outcomeMeasures.description: The measure is to determine a number of successfully recruited overweight or obese adolescents to a randomized trial of lifestyle therapy in the community of Rochester, NY

outcomeMeasures.title: Weight Loss in Lifestyle Intervention Group
outcomeMeasures.description: In the adolescent women assigned to the lifestyle program, did the intervention program obtain weight reduction as measured by change in BMI

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Free Androgen Index (FAI)
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary measures of reduction in androgen measures of the different treatment arms. This is a ratio of total testosterone to sex hormone binding globulin (SHBG). The lower values correlate with lower amount of free testosterone. FAI \<4 is consistent with a normal range.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in SHBG
outcomeMeasures.description: Measurement of SHBG by treatment group pre and post intervention

outcomeMeasures.title: Triglyceride Concentration by Treatment Group
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in triglyceride measures pre and post intervention as representative of lipid changes by treatment group; metformin, lifestyle intervention, oral contraceptive or placebo

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Fasting Glucose
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in fasting glucose concentration by treatment group pre to post intervention
